column4: I just freshly reinstalled ubuntu, and I am having some sound issues: using ALSA, with both onboard and a PCI soundcard, if I do something like drag around terminals or switch virtual desktops, my sound gets terribly scratchy...but it is fine when I am not doing stuff like that...anybody have an idea?
try a diff sound system (like OSS for example)
why do u need two scards any way =/????
